page.title: 17SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content: Miles Laboratories have a research site in Stoke Poges. It is a subsidary of a German company. They research new drugs for{bacterial infections, fungal {diseases, metabolic diseases, pain, {inflammation,allergies, cardiovascular {diseases and respiratory diseases. Animals are used in some of the testing but their treatment is strictly controlled. They are humanely treated. Even so security has to be strong as there is a minority group in this country who break into such establishments and free the animals as they think experimentation on animals is wrong. Similar work is done at Fulmer Hall.
